targets.query:
SELECT mean("avg_by_group") *100
FROM (
   SELECT mean("last_value_by_flow") as "avg_by_group" 
   FROM ( 
      SELECT last(value) as "last_value_by_flow"
      FROM "smoke_test_status"  
      WHERE "job" = 'smoke_tests_worker'  AND ( "datacenter" = 'JAX' OR "datacenter" = 'BDU') 
      GROUP BY "name", "group", "datacenter" 
   )
   GROUP BY "group", "datacenter"
)
WHERE "group" != 'licenseesBeta' AND "group" != 'secure.cebroker.com'

SELECT mean("avg_by_group") *100
FROM (
   SELECT mean("last_value_by_flow") as "avg_by_group" 
   FROM ( 
      SELECT last(value) as "last_value_by_flow"
      FROM "smoke_test_status"  
      WHERE "job" = 'smoke_tests_worker' AND "datacenter" = 'JAX' 
      GROUP BY "name", "group", "datacenter" 
   )
   GROUP BY "group", "datacenter"
)
WHERE "group" != 'licenseesBeta' AND "group" != 'secure.cebroker.com'

WHERE "group" != 'licenseesBeta' AND "group" != 'secure.cebroker.com'
GROUP BY "group"

SELECT mean("last_value_by_suite") as "last_updated"
FROM ( 
      SELECT last(value) as "last_value_by_suite"
      FROM "smoke_tests_last_time"  
      WHERE "job" = 'smoke_tests_worker'  AND "datacenter" = 'JAX'
      GROUP BY "group"
)
WHERE "group" != 'licenseesBeta' AND "group" != 'secure.cebroker.com'
GROUP BY "group"

SELECT mean("last_value_by_suite") as "test_status"
FROM ( 
      SELECT last(value) as "last_value_by_suite"
      FROM "smoke_service_suite_status"  
      WHERE "job" = 'smoke_tests_worker' AND "datacenter" = 'JAX'
      GROUP BY "group"
)
WHERE "group" != 'licenseesBeta' AND "group" != 'secure.cebroker.com'
GROUP BY "group"

      GROUP BY "name", "group", "datacenter" 
)
WHERE "group" != 'licenseesBeta' AND "group" != 'secure.cebroker.com'

FROM ( 
      SELECT last(value) as "last_value_by_suite"
      FROM "smoke_tests_last_time"

SELECT mean("grouped_mean") *100
FROM (
SELECT mean(value) AS "grouped_mean"
FROM "smoke_test_status"  
WHERE "job" = 'smoke_tests_worker' AND "group" != 'licenseesBeta' AND "group" != 'secure.cebroker.com'  AND ( "datacenter" = 'JAX' OR "datacenter" = 'BDU') 
GROUP BY "name", "group", "datacenter" 
)

SELECT mean("value")  * 100 FROM "smoke_test_status" WHERE ("job" = 'smoke_tests_worker' AND "group" != 'licenseesBeta' AND "group" != 'secure.cebroker.com') AND $timeFilter  AND ( "datacenter" = 'JAX' OR "datacenter" = 'BDU')

select mean("floored_value") * 100
from (
 SELECT floor(value) AS "floored_value" 
 FROM "smoke_test_status" 
 WHERE ("job" = 'smoke_tests_worker' AND "group" != 'licenseesBeta' AND "group" != 'secure.cebroker.com') 
  AND $timeFilter  AND ( "datacenter" = 'JAX' OR "datacenter" = 'BDU') 
 GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
)

targets.expr:

  AND $timeFilter 
 GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
)
targets.query:
select mean("floored_value") * 100
from (
 SELECT floor(value) AS "floored_value" 
 FROM "smoke_test_status" 
 WHERE ("job" = 'smoke_tests_worker' AND "group" != 'licenseesBeta' AND "group" != 'secure.cebroker.com')  AND ( "datacenter" = 'JAX' OR "datacenter" = 'BDU') 
  AND $timeFilter 
 GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
)

SELECT mean(value) * 100
 FROM "smoke_test_status" 
 WHERE ("job" = 'smoke_tests_worker' AND "group" != 'licenseesBeta' AND "group" != 'secure.cebroker.com') 
  AND $timeFilter  AND ( "datacenter" = 'JAX' OR "datacenter" = 'BDU') 
 GROUP BY time(5m) fill(null)

SELECT percentile("value", 95) FROM "smoke_test_status" WHERE ("group" != 'licenseesBeta' AND "group" != 'secure.cebroker.com' AND "job" = 'smoke_tests_worker') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT 100-(mean(value) * 100)
 FROM "smoke_test_status" 
 WHERE ("job" = 'smoke_tests_worker' AND "group" != 'licenseesBeta' AND "group" != 'secure.cebroker.com') 
  AND $timeFilter  AND ( "datacenter" = 'JAX' OR "datacenter" = 'BDU') 
 GROUP BY time(5m) fill(null)

select mean("floored_value") * 100
from (
 SELECT floor(value) AS "floored_value"

  AND $timeFilter  AND ( "datacenter" = 'JAX' OR "datacenter" = 'BDU') 
 GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT mean(value) * 100
 FROM "smoke_test_status" 
 WHERE ("job" = 'smoke_tests_worker' AND "group" != 'licenseesBeta' AND "group" != 'secure.cebroker.com') 
  AND $timeFilter  AND ( "datacenter" = 'JAX' OR "datacenter" = 'BDU') 
 GROUP BY time(5m), "datacenter" fill(null)

SELECT percentile("value", 95) FROM "smoke_test_status" WHERE ("group" != 'licenseesBeta' AND "group" != 'secure.cebroker.com' AND "job" = 'smoke_tests_worker') AND $timeFilter  AND ( "datacenter" = 'JAX' OR "datacenter" = 'BDU')  GROUP BY time($__interval), "datacenter" fill(null)

SELECT count("value") 
FROM "smoke_tests_total" 
WHERE ("job" = 'smoke_tests_worker' AND "status" = 'failed' AND "value" > 0) AND $timeFilter AND "group" != 'licenseesBeta' AND "group" != 'secure.cebroker.com'  AND ( "datacenter" = 'JAX' OR "datacenter" = 'BDU') 
GROUP BY time(1h), "group" fill(0)

SELECT count("value") 
FROM "smoke_tests_total"
WHERE ("job" = 'smoke_tests_worker' AND "status" = 'failed' AND "value" > 0) AND $timeFilter AND "group" != 'licenseesBeta' AND "group" != 'secure.cebroker.com'  AND ( "datacenter" = 'JAX' OR "datacenter" = 'BDU') 
GROUP BY time(5m), "datacenter", "group" fill(0)

SELECT mean("value") 
FROM "smoke_test_duration_seconds" 
WHERE ("job" = 'smoke_tests_worker' AND "value" > 0) AND $timeFilter AND "group" != 'licenseesBeta' AND "group" != 'secure.cebroker.com'  AND ( "datacenter" = 'JAX' OR "datacenter" = 'BDU') 
GROUP BY time($__interval), "datacenter", "group" fill(0)

SELECT mean("last_value_by_flow") as "avg_status_by_flow"
FROM ( 
      SELECT last(value) as "last_value_by_flow"
      FROM "smoke_test_status"  
      WHERE "job" = 'smoke_tests_worker'  AND ( "datacenter" = 'JAX' ) 
      GROUP BY "name", "group", "datacenter" 
)
GROUP BY "name", "datacenter"

SELECT mean("last_value_by_flow") as "avg_status_by_flow"
FROM ( 
      SELECT last(value) as "last_value_by_flow"
      FROM "smoke_test_status"  
      WHERE "job" = 'smoke_tests_worker'  AND ( "datacenter" = 'BDU' ) 
      GROUP BY "name", "group", "datacenter" 
)
GROUP BY "name", "datacenter"
